TopicTitle: How do i add science defs to my planets?

Articles.Content: I am currently attempting to develop a kopernicus planet pack, but there is one issue : I don't know how to add science defs! I also plan on adding compatibility with non-stock science experiments

On 7/30/2021 at 11:31 PM, thekerbalman said:

I am currently attempting to develop a kopernicus planet pack, but there is one issue : I don't know how to add science defs! I also plan on adding compatibility with non-stock science experiments

Do it later when your planets are mostly done

On 7/30/2021 at 11:31 PM, thekerbalman said:

I am currently attempting to develop a kopernicus planet pack, but there is one issue : I don't know how to add science defs! I also plan on adding compatibility with non-stock science experiments

Via configs 
its a little deep and complex so you should do it later 
although you can share your planet pack development!
